duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through B2B sales and client acquisition.
Proactively seek out business opportunities and maintain a high level of activity through client prospecting.
Lead critical business discussions with business owners to identify and solve their promotion and sales challenges.
Maintain and manage client relationships for future revenue growth.
Utilize the custom CRM platform for effective client acquisition and management.
Demonstrate compelling and persistent communication skills to bring concepts to life and drive sales.
Maintain a hit list and prioritize opportunities for maximum sales effectiveness.
Engage in face-to-face networking and portfolio building activities.
Train in all aspects of publishing and receive ongoing support to meet high-performance standards.
Use a compelling, provocative communication style to sit at the top of the sales leaderboard.
Take control of the future with a refusal to lose attitude and apply for limited territories.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
